concept.title: Device Driver Quick Start
concept.shortdesc: A quick introduction to the Device Driver documentation.

conbody.p: The device driver documents are split into two main sections:

section.title: Device driver guide
section.p: The device driver guide explains the concepts of device driver frame work and how to implement a device driver.

li.p: For the basic concepts of device driver, see Device Driver Concepts
To write a device driver, see Device Driver Writing Guide
To use the kernel services in a device driver, see Kernel- Side Services
To debug your device driver implementation, see Debug Monitor Tool

section.title: Service level SHAIs
section.p: The service level SHAIs provide kernel services to the hardware components.

li.p: To use the general purpose input/output (GPIO) functions, see GPIO Overview
To use the SD based input/output (SDIO) functions, see SDIO Overview
To use the Direct Memory Access (DMA) related functions, see DMA Overview
